descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

[media]
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

[media]

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

[media]
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

[media]

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

[media]


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**

# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623592_1242411587354095_8518052294169653959_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Y3f_Kxal42AQ7kNvwFf4PK7&_nc_oc=AdmCQPMNfKA0PD_t3jlL8vf3UjY3SlcCALzzidNiyBddHc3Fukrpk82OeexhJO_7iac&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9V6KNlLEIJnuSxbhO-btGA&oh=00_AfskD6JMuydVcWfOAJ5ipzGMcATHlTCX_2tdNN8O_44hsg&oe=6995B610)
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824697_1278851210611188_4094365675689352297_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=XuogDLDWkyQQ7kNvwGYfg4F&_nc_oc=AdmsUZXXGm1JWxR6OkqElIDyLVUaGWEjR7BUdu6lWxjhNItkuAw1SKRB0A7VKkUO2Bk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9V6KNlLEIJnuSxbhO-btGA&oh=00_AftGDVMp_1poD8kYAVDQSag6rEQVb31FBqC3aAuysUhSmA&oe=6995D7D6)

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292426_1471237290743467_5955331649547554072_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CthjKmNIY-UQ7kNvwHVdbWh&_nc_oc=AdnCOLBV0xweOZvblgsXPwhjbXv-tDNSneh-L6jhoQILw14OQ1Vse3wqQ6urCiDa_4A&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9V6KNlLEIJnuSxbhO-btGA&oh=00_Afv0gQmclhLeT-J2dVSaNkv-qbRikMzkFOAL1CV4Ck1cgQ&oe=6995AA85)
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499299164_23905805109048560_5254487432958572571_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=X5ltfbqp0_UQ7kNvwHgjEp5&_nc_oc=AdkmizASr23oBuUNTiFiD1ttL-UanQvZl1bkt9nHi8jHh-nr-yKR-PI_-_-5eXyMURw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9V6KNlLEIJnuSxbhO-btGA&oh=00_Afs709r6Ekr474iuM99KO_ybPQ4y5qQ0fukvErjIdc2i9g&oe=6995D567)

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819854_2661665637369878_2167100156395054220_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=YJihzmzgBhYQ7kNvwGti80x&_nc_oc=Adnu8FnTflKko66vUUs66UiPxnrMhwVW_bXcCsXBI-wj8R8dY2Lph7_d_uw1iCGyZ6E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9V6KNlLEIJnuSxbhO-btGA&oh=00_AftxbuXMBPnoc21ixACCvvw8iZmmZZ7d4bRbD07YentaBw&oe=6995D469)
